metadata.dc:author: Chamorro, A
metadata.dc:description: This review considers secondary prevention of ictus based on the use of oral anticoagulant drugs. For this, we analyze separately the secondary preventive aspects of the two most frequent ischemic aetiologies: cardioembolic and atherothrombotic infarcts.
metadata.dc:title: Anticoagulación oral para la prevención secundaria del ictus isquémico.
[Oral anticoagulation in the secondary prevention of stroke].
